body: Well, this is the best decision they can make. Leaving this location before getting fu*ked to death.

@Hentai saint no seeing how they've all had this mindset that the world is over they might as well live everyday like it's the last. They likely tired themselves out with a mix of poisoning them seeing as you see the teacher dying and that dark look on the girl's face as she smiling and not paying attention to his last words. With this artist Style it's easy to find that point when characters are smiling like normal people and smiling like Psychopaths! But the teacher brought on themselves as he said the world is over morality really has no place in this Mad World. So he got what he deserved because as I stated Loverboy was the lucky one because he didn't become a piece of shit rapist. So he got a harem by the fact you didn't treat the girls like sex objects LOL. Basically the only sane man and I say man by gender that the girls can trust! At least glasses got out of this alive if traumatized!
So the gang of five slaughtered everyone else??
Damn that shit was unexpecting af, got me good

@xyst16 Well this is kind of like the first time in a while where the bad thing happens to bad people with "good people" benefiting over other assholes (but knowing how he is it's very likely they've gone insane, but their more sympathic LOL)
Well that's Hal doujin for you a sick plot twist in the end, if wasn't like that wouldn't be one from Hal

I'm going to go out on a limb and assume that they made a Pact to survive together. Loverboy became the group shared man so everything is consensual. Likely what happened was staying together they were able to collect supplies you know act like fucking normal, while everyone in the sex cult pretty much fuck themselves that they didn't focus on their needs and may have gotten sick or they were poisoned knowing how hal works. Initially I was confused about the blond dying man till I realized it was the piece of shit teacher. But look like they made certain glasses girl was the only Survivor. Looking at the black hair guy well it's easy to Guess that they all unified in surviving but wanted to make certain no one who knew them would come looking for them which makes sense with how the teacher acted in the first chapter so he was just getting his Just Desserts! Lover boy is a lucky guy he got himself a consensual Harem just by not turning into a douchebag! The others had their fun and died
what the heck happened at the end
